Detailed Description

Elliptic Curve only key derivation function.

Author:
Graham Enos

Function Documentation

ZZ block ( const size_t  i  ) 

The ith block O_i is (random)^{B_LEN - I_LEN} || {I_LEN bit repr of i}, similar to the original ECOH submission

Uses Icart's f from "How to Hash into Elliptic Curves" and Moloney, O'Mahony, & Laurent's birational map from "Efficient Implementation of Elliptic Curve Point Operations Using Binary Edwards Curves"

ZZ StoZZ ( const string &  s  ) 

Treat a string of characters as a bunch of bytes (ASCII), then use those bytes to build a ZZ

Extra NOPS (to protect against side-channel/timing attacks)
